Register tokens are assigned position ids (e.g.,t+dâˆ’1ğ‘¡ğ‘‘1t+d-1italic_t + italic_d - 1forrdsubscriptğ‘Ÿğ‘‘r_{d}italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_d end_POSTSUBSCRIPTtargetingxt+dsubscriptğ‘¥ğ‘¡ğ‘‘x_{t+d}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + italic_d end_POSTSUBSCRIPT) that mimic next-token prediction.
